thread.title: Cristiano Ronaldo sets the tone as Real Madrid top La Liga table
thread.title_full: Cristiano Ronaldo sets the tone as Real Madrid top La Liga table | The Financial Express

author: financialexpress.com
title: Cristiano Ronaldo sets the tone as Real Madrid top La Liga table
text:
Other Articles Arsenal top Premier League table with 2-1 win over Everton Giroud, Koscielny head Arsenal to win over porous Everton Real Madrid's Benitez hopeful on Modric fitness for Celta clash Real Madrid stretched their unbeaten run to 12 games as they thrashed 10-man Celta de Vigo 3-1 to move three points clear of the second-placed rival at the top of La Liga table.
Cristiano Ronaldo opened the scoring in the eighth minute before Brazilian full-back Danilo doubled the lead to give Real a commanding 2-0 lead by 23rd minute.
Celtaâ€™s hopes of staging a fightback suffered a heavy blow in the 57th minute when the centre back Gustavo Cabral was given marching orders after earning a second yellow card, the Guardian reported.
Although Nolito pulled one back for Celta through with a stunning drive five minutes from time, Marcelo scored in the final minute to make it 3-1.
 25, 2015 11:59 am
